name: HappyLife
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Sometimes you don't have the opportunity to really hear the advice your wife is giving. Now you can tune in and get a play by play on all the things you could be improving on and have most likely already got wrong.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
